Outline
Vision, Strategy or Objective (Metrics, Identified Pain)
•
Support a fast-growing sales organization that is looking to scale

Provide a single source of truth for sales. Development of a centralized location for information to enable Upwork to scale

Drive operational efficiency, increase profitability, minimize risk & IT Spend 
Top Deal #1 – Upwork
Power (Economic Buyer, 
Champion)
Budget (Decision 
Criteria/Process, Paper Process)
TimingValue
•
Economic Buyer – CFO
•
Who are the key influencers
•
SVP Sales, Dir of Finance 
and Sales Ops
•
100% BLIPP coverage = Business, 
Legal, IT, Procurement, Partner
•
Budget identified
•
Internal process is known from 
previous transaction.
•
PO is required
•
Desired project start date 8/16
•
Rapid growth is driving timing
•
Value assessment complete
•
Revenue impacts, rep & ops 
productivity and cost reductions 
identified
Compelling EventsRisks (Competition)Mitigating StrategiesExec Alignment
•
Planning for next fiscal year 
•
8/16 desired start date
•
New CFO, budget approval 
•
Strong champions in finance and 
sales ops
•
Lacking. Had exec alignment with 
previous CFO, but new CFO
•
Nassar reached out to SVP sales

attend kick off
